trans-unit.source: Install regular updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple
trans-unit.target: Install regular updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple

trans-unit.source: Explains how to use the StorSimple update feature and Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to install regular updates.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to use the StorSimple update feature and Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to install regular updates.

trans-unit.source: To install regular updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple
trans-unit.target: To install regular updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple

trans-unit.source: Open the device serial console and select option 1, **Log in with full access**.
trans-unit.target: Open the device serial console and select option 1, **Log in with full access**.

trans-unit.source: You will be notified if updates are available and whether the updates are disruptive or non-disruptive.
trans-unit.target: You will be notified if updates are available and whether the updates are disruptive or non-disruptive.

trans-unit.source: This command applies only to regular updates.
trans-unit.target: This command applies only to regular updates.

trans-unit.source: You run this command on only one controller, but both controllers will be updated.
trans-unit.target: You run this command on only one controller, but both controllers will be updated.

trans-unit.source: You may notice a controller failover during the update process; however, the failover will not affect system availability or operation.
trans-unit.target: You may notice a controller failover during the update process; however, the failover will not affect system availability or operation.
